DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the impact of using a real time radiation exposure monitoring device on the patient and operator radiation exposure during cardiac catheterization. The hypothesis of the study is that use of a real time radiation exposure monitoring device during cardiac catheterization will decrease both patient and operator radiation exposure compared to no use of the monitoring device.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of a Real Time Radiation Monitoring Device on Radiation Exposure During Cardiac Catheterization
